record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JUNE 9, 2008, AT 3:15 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JUNE 9, 2008, AT 3:15 P.M. -- (Senate - June 06, 2008)

[Page: S5376]

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 2:08 p.m., adjourned until Monday, June 9, 2008, at 3:15 p.m.
